name: Acania Together
description:
This is the multiplayer version of Acania - my first game with smooth 3D combat in  both PvE and PvP. 

The project is still in early devleopment, and I have a 20 concurrent user limit for multiplayer. So I try to only distribute this version inside my Discord channel. Thank you for understanding.

For more information and find other players, please visit my Discord channel:

htps://discord.gg/bNXREy3
